summary: The module demonstrates how to create a custom picture classification enrichment model and integrate it into a Docling processing pipeline. It defines a callable model that assigns classification labels to suitable picture items, wraps the model in a pipeline that prepares configuration and executes the classification step, and provides a main routine that runs the pipeline on a PDF document to produce enriched output.
business_intent: Showcase the extension of the Docling framework with a userâ€‘defined image classification component, enabling automated categorization of pictures in documents for enhanced metadata, searchability, and downstream analytics.
